will 
generate DAO interface and DAOImplementation classes. when i generate=
 
automated JUnit test class, should i create on DAOImplementation or DAO 
=
interface.

My feeling is that I should use DAOImplementation classes as th=
ere are 
SQL queries and methods like CRUD operations are implemented in 
D=
AOImpl.jav class rather DAO interface.


help will be appreciated.
